name: accomplishable
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
possible to achieve: It is important to set yourself accomplishable goals. Obviously, the surgeon can only commit to do what is technically accomplishable. Related word
accomplishSynonym
achievable
More examplesFewer examplesHis intention was to set a target that was ambitious but accomplishable.Developing a computer-assisted operation appeared to be a productive and accomplishable task.An obsession with the unobtainable ideal can prevent you from doing accomplishable good things.We want the success of the project and, unless we change direction, that is not accomplishable.We need to work towards a collaboration where each side feels comfortable, and I think that's accomplishable.
